name: EDD Add To Cart Redirect
author: Andrew Munro, Sumobi

sections.description:
This plugin requires Easy Digital Downloads.

EDD Add To Cart Redirect allows you to redirect to any post, page, or download after the download has been added to the cart. It also allows you to set invidual downloads to redirect directly to the checkout, rather than all or none. It add’s 2 new options to a download’s edit/publish screen, in the “Download Settings” metabox that EDD adds.

It works with and without ajax enabled from downloads → settings → misc, on download grids, and on single download pages. When EDD v2.1 is released there will be a “redirect” parameter that will work with the [purchase_link] shortcode.

Want more free EDD plugins?

To fund ongoing development of more free EDD plugins, I would greatly appreciate any of the below:

  1. Buy one of my commercial EDD plugins

  2. Use my referral code when you purchase your next EDD plugin

  3. Donate via PayPal

sections.installation:
1. Unpack the entire contents of this plugin zip file into your wp-content/plugins/ folder locally
  2. Upload to your site
  3. Navigate to wp-admin/plugins.php on your site (your WP Admin plugin page)
  4. Activate this plugin
  5. Set where a download should redirect to from the “Download Settings” metabox on the edit/publish screen of a download

OR you can just install it with WordPress by going to Plugins >> Add New >> and type this plugin’s name
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

Fix: PHP Warning
Fix: Hidden text field was showing on page when ajax is enabled

1.0

  • Initial release
